charges.charge_description: 18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES; Offense Date: 1/16/97; Penalty: Five (5) years imprisonment and/or $250,000 fine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Sentence: Count 1: 37 months BOP; 3 yrs SRT with supervision; $100 S/A due immediately; Fine waived: RESTITUTION: The Deft is jointly and severally liable with Francisco Ledesma.
